price: 43. Waxaana (Xaqa) ka jeediyey waxay caabudeysey Alle sokadi, waxay ka mid aheyd qolo gaalo ah11.
arabic: وَصَدَّهَا مَا كَانَت تَّعۡبُدُ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِۖ إِنَّهَا كَانَتۡ مِن قَوۡمٖ كَٰفِرِينَ
footnotes: 11. Balqiis waxay ku ogaatay Nabinnimada Sulaymaan ka hor inta aan la keenin carshigeeda xagga Falastiin soo celintii dib loogu soo celiyey hadiyaddii ay dirtay.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waṣaddahā mā kānat taʿbudu min dūni al-lahi innahā kānat min qawmin kāfirīna
